    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public TowerPosition initialize(int turn)
        Description copied from interface: ITower
        Called once and only once, when a tower is created. Towers are created at the end of a player's turn, one per turn, based upon a pending queue. This method must return the position of the tower, which includes coordinates (x,y) and the maximum number of collisions that the tower can sustain before being extinguished. Each time a ball collides with a tower, the remaining number of collisions is reduced by one; when that count reaches zero, the tower is extinguished. A tower can also extinguish itself by responding to ITower.extinguish(int).
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface ITower
        Returns:
        the board position and maximum collisions for this tower.

      • onCaptureBall

        public Heading onCaptureBall(PinballEngine.TeamType teamType,
                             Heading heading)
        Description copied from interface: ITower
        Called when a ball collides with this tower. Upon a collision, a tower can direct the colliding ball in any direction.
        Specified by:
        onCaptureBall in interface ITower
        Returns:
        the direction for the colliding ball.

      • onDetectBall

        public void onDetectBall(PinballEngine.TeamType teamType,
                         Position position)
        Description copied from interface: ITower
        Called when a ball passes within detection range of a tower. Balls are detected within a radius of a maximum of 5 squares (see ITower.getDetectionRadius()).
        Specified by:
        onDetectBall in interface ITower

      • extinguish

        public boolean extinguish(int turn)
        Description copied from interface: ITower
        Called once per turn. Returning true causes the tower to be extinguished.
        Specified by:
        extinguish in interface ITower
        Returns:
        true to cause the tower to be extinguished; otherwise false.

      • getDetectionRadius

        public int getDetectionRadius()
        Description copied from interface: ITower
        Called once per turn. Determines the radius at which a ball can be detected. Minimum is zero (no detection), maximum is five squares.
        Specified by:
        getDetectionRadius in interface ITower
        Returns:
        detection radius.
